title: 指令正误
txt_content: /give @a minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amout:7.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:\"display那边是重点\"}, display:{Name:"display前面要不要加{}"},Lore:["还有前面的转义"，"谢谢^W^"]}}

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
/give @a minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 
{
        AttributeModifiers:[
                {Operation:0,
                UUIDLeast:1,
                UUIDMost:1,
                Amount:7,
                AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",
                Name:"apple"
                }
        ],
        display:{
                Name:"{苹果}",
                Lore:["啊","拿好..."]
        }
}复制代码
attributemodifiers [ ]不对等
generic.attackDamage两边打双点
operation大写
Lore属于display之下
逗号使用英文输入法
不是json不需要转义
Amont拼写错误

⊙v⊙ 发表于 2017-8-23 14:32
attributemodifiers [ ]不对等
generic.attackDamage两边打双点
operation大写

Lore属于display之下
[]不对等
看不出来呀!233
还有双点指的是""号吗?

⊙v⊙ 发表于 2017-8-23 14:32
attributemodifiers [ ]不对等
generic.attackDamage两边打双点
operation大写

/give @a minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:7.0,AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"display那边是重点"}], display:{Name:"generic前1.8能不能不要加双点",Lore:["修改了,呵呵","谢谢o>_<o","还有错吗?"]}}}
